title: October 28, 2019: Status Network Token (SNT): Up 4.14%; Anomalies In Holders Added And Transfers Added
text:
Status Network Token Price Update

Status Network Token is up by approximately 4.14% from the previous day, with its price currently hovering around $0.01333 USD. Status Network Token is currently in a unclear , and it should be noted that this is now the the 2nd straight day that price has been up. Moreover, Status Network Token is now 6.48% above its 20 day moving average. Status Network Token’s expected trading range — as forecasted by the Bollinger bands indicator, which determines a range based on momentum and volatility over the past two weeks — is between $0.011595 and $0.013443. As we are closer to the top of that range, rangebound traders may wish to consider exploring selling opportunities.

The market capitalization of Status Network Token, or the amount of US dollars it would take to buy up all the circulating coins, is currently estimated to be $45 million.

Status Network Token’s Surprises of the Day

Yesterday, the metrics holders added and transfers added saw a daily change well outside what is usually experienced. An exploration as to what caused this may be worthwhile.

Update on Transactions and Holders

570 transactions amongst holders of Status Network Token occurred yesterday. Regarding a tally of holders, Yesterday saw Status Network Token’s wallet count rise by 0. To provide context, we’d rank this token as 23 out of the 34 Ethereum tokens in our index based on percentage growth in engagement over the past 7 days.

Just How Rich are Status Network Token’s Richest Holders?

The top 1,000 Status Network Token wallets hold over 96.14% of the token’s total money supply. The percent of the currency that is owned by wallets that are both belonging to exchanges and in the top 1,000 richest wallets of the token comes out to 12.21% of the currency’s money supply. Exchange ownership grew by 0.18% over the past week, while the overall ownership percentage of the top 1,000 richest wallets grew by -0.02% over that time period.

How Much Development is Occurring?

Status Network Token hasn’t had any activity on any of its GitHub repos since October 24, 2019 — 4 days prior. Over the past 30 days, we’ve seen open issues across Status Network Token’s GitHub repositories grow by 0.03 per day on average, while the number of watchers has grown by 0.07.

What’s Going on Social Media?

Traders interested in following Status Network Token has the biggest presence on Twitter, where it has 110,933 users engaged. You can follow Status Network Token on Twitter here.

Article by SixJupiter
